name: 魏敏樺
objective: 土壤與結構物之間的界面有應力的存在，該應力的大小與土壤及結構物的力學性質有關，也與結構物的變形有關.列如:地下室開控過程中，擋土結構物的變形，擋土牆的變位,基樁的變位等等。
schedule:
Week 1 : Introduction
Week 2 : Soil/structure shear strength, earth pressures
Week 3 : Soil/structure shear strength, earth pressures
Week 4 : Measurement and Selection of Design Parameters (soil, water)
Week 5 : Measurement and Selection of Design Parameters (soil, water)
Week 6 : Temporary works, design of wall structures, grd. movement
Week 7 : Temporary works, design of wall structures, grd. movement
Week 8 : Presentation on Case Study
Week 9 : Midterm Exam Week
Week 10: Application of centrifuge in SSI
Week 11: Application of numerical modelling in SSI
Week 12: Introduction of a numerical tool – FLAC
Week 13: Soil constitutive models commonly used
Week 14: Incorporating soil models into FLAC
Week 15: FLAC Workshop
Week 16: FLAC Workshop
Week 17: Case Study Presentation
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. Homeworks:       20%
2. Presentation:       20%,
2. Project and Report: 20%,
3. Exams:              40%
materials:
• Lecture notes
• Terzaghi and Peck. “Soil Mechanics in Engineering Practice.” John Wiley and Sons.
• Padfield, C. J. and Mair, R. J. (1984). “Design of Retaining Walls Embedded in Stiff Clay.” CIRIA Report No 104, London.
